title: Imp

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Starts as a townie. Becomes a random Underworld once one other Underworld remains. Cannot spawn as a conversion immune town.
- You are aware you are an imp when the game begins
- The other Underworld know who you are and cannot perform actions that negatively affect you.
- Spawns in a good slot
- May only spawn if another underworld is present

desc:
Post 1066
*The demons, they come from below.*
